sentences.en: A real pizza oven gives better results than an ordinary home oven.
sentences.cn: 专门的比萨烤箱比普通家用烤箱效果更好。

sentences.en: Art should be part of ordinary life.
sentences.cn: 艺术应该是日常生活的一部分。

sentences.en: Food for the ordinary Soviet troops and NCOs was very poor.
sentences.cn: 苏联普通士兵的伙食很糟糕。

sentences.en: For ordinary Italians, Sunday's news probably amounts to a mixed blessing.
sentences.cn: 对普通的意大利人民来说，星期天的新闻可以说是悲喜交加。

sentences.en: I thought the paintings were pretty ordinary.
sentences.cn: 我认为这些画相当平庸。

sentences.en: I've noticed nothing out of the ordinary.
sentences.cn: 我没注意到什么特别之处。

sentences.en: It has 25 calories less than ordinary ice cream.
sentences.cn: 它所含热量比普通的冰激凌少了25卡路里。

sentences.en: It is good because it is written in friendly, ordinary language.
sentences.cn: 它很不错，因为它是用平易近人的日常语言写的。

sentences.en: It is his popularity with ordinary people that sets him apart.
sentences.cn: 正是他在普通民众中的声望使他与众不同。

sentences.en: It may also appeal to the latent chauvinism of many ordinary people.
sentences.cn: 它可能也迎合了许多普通人心中的沙文主义情结。

sentences.en: It was just an ordinary voice, but he sang in tune.
sentences.cn: 他声音很一般，但唱得都在调子上。

sentences.en: It’s just an ordinary camera.
sentences.cn: 这只是普通的相机。

sentences.en: nothing out of the ordinary happened.
sentences.cn: 没有任何异常情况发生。

sentences.en: Ordinary people are at the mercy of faceless bureaucrats.
sentences.cn: 普通人的命运任凭那些平庸刻板的官僚们摆布。

sentences.en: painter in ordinary to Her Majesty.
sentences.cn: 女王陛下的御用画家。

sentences.en: The book is about ordinary people.
sentences.cn: 这本书描写的是普通人。

sentences.en: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.--Jimmy Johnson
sentences.cn: 平凡与非凡的差异仅在于那一点点额外的努力。

sentences.en: The needs and opinions of ordinary working people were ignored.
sentences.cn: 普通劳动者的需求和意见遭到忽视。

sentences.en: These establishments are off limits to ordinary citizens.
sentences.cn: 这些建筑禁止普通公民入内。

sentences.en: This Human Rights Act is enforceable in the ordinary courts.
sentences.cn: 这项《人权法案》适用于普通法庭。

sentences.en: This is by no means out of the ordinary.
sentences.cn: 这丝毫不足为奇。

sentences.en: Your life since then must have seemed very ordinary.
sentences.cn: 你的生活从那时起一定非常平淡无奇。

phrases.tran_cn: (英)（头衔）常任的（尤指皇家御用的）
平常的一天；[地磁]平常日
普通程度的；（英）普通级考试（等于O leve）

trans.tran_en: average, common, or usual, not different or special
